wikipedia_page.main: Chris Hicken (born in West Bromwich, England) is a British singer, songwriter, and producer who records under the name Cantinero. Currently based in Inwood, Manhattan New York, Hicken writes keenly observed, carefully crafted pop that blends acoustic and Spanish guitars, piano, and strings, with subtle electronic textures. His debut album, Championship Boxing, was released by indie label Artemis Records in 2004. The next album Better for the Metaphor, released November 2008 on the Tinkle Tone Recordings, has been listed as one of the Best CDs of 2008 by  NPR.

response: Cantinero, Billy Miles, Richard Julian, The Young Dubliners, Christine Martucci, Jackie Greene, The Shore, The John Butler Trio, Maia Sharp, Josh Ritter, Charlie Mars and Francis Dunnery.
